# The `AssertAlignSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> that records if a register contains a value that is guaranteed to be aligned accordingly. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration
